ORIGAM Documentation : Default Value Parameter

Created by Tomáš Vavrda, last modified by Zuzana Čapková on Dec 13, 2019

Default Value Parameter is a type of a report parameter that uses an already predefined default value saved as a data constant.

ATTRIBUTES

 

AllowsNullsDefault value is set to True.
DataLengthDepending on the data type fill in the desired data length, e.g. 8 for a date or 100 for a string.
DataTypeSelect the data type of the parameter.
DefaultValueSelect the data constant you want to use as a parameter.
